title: Handling

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, you may choose to attach Strings to a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each night, players with Strings attached will be roleblocked if no one visits them.
- At the start of the day, if all non-Psychopathic players have Strings attached, all players will be informed. If the town isn't able to hang you today, The Psychopath wins the game at the start of the night.
- If two or more good players visit a player with Strings, they'll discover the strings and cut them off.
- While you control The Psychopath, all players with Strings are immediately informed that they have lost control of their limbs. You learn the role of each player with Strings and can control each one into visiting any target. However, each player who you control will have their Strings break off.
Kill Note Addition:
*The note is composed of several careful newspaper clippings. It reads:*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.

desc:
Post 5011
*Watchful fingers. Master of objects. Interact with complex mechanisms and precisely maneuver tiny needles.*
